column1: back of a length, and bounces across du Plessis as he leaves
outside off, and he defends a length ball moving a touch away from him
length, a hint of movement away from du Plessis, who defends this towards point
length, outside off, and he defends
length, just on off stump, and du Plessis defends this
length, slower outside off, and he punches this away a little wide of cover
length, and he punches this away towards cover
length, outside off, and he cuts this aerially, and it just eludes the man at short third man. Not far away from him, but ran away for four once it went over him
little shorter in length, and he cuts this towards point
short, and he goes back and punches this towards deep midwicket. There's a man stationed in the deep for that precise shot
flatter, straighter, and he defends this back to Pandya

length, just outside off, and he tentatively pokes at it, and it just beats his outside edge. Hands on head from Krunal Pandya and Rohit Sharma at first slip. Quinton de Kock whipped the bails off too, but he was always inside the crease

strikes immediately! Just on a length outside off, and he looks to cut this but gets it straight to point, and it wasn't the most difficult of catches for the man stationed there. Just needed to stay low and pick up the first wicket of this innings
length bal, straightens into him, and he looks to flick but is beaten by the turn into him. Hits him on the pad, but going down leg
sharp turn, from a good length, as he looks to play this off the crease towards midwicket. Beats the inside edge again
tossed up, a bit shorter in length, and he looks for a whip through the on side, and is able to place it to the right of square leg
length, turns away from him after pitching just outside off, and he lets this pass
tossed up, and he presses forward and defends this
oversteps with his first ball. on a length, and he defends, but this will be a free hit!
goes back to a length ball and drop-kicks this over square leg. Good shot. It was re-bowled as the first ball, also hit for four, was called a dead ball because the field had changed
defends a length ball
length ball, and he goes for a hoick across the line, and this ballooons in the air, and is an easy return catch for Yadav
length, and he flicks this away, and short midwicket dives away to his right to stop them from looking for runs
sharp turn from a length, pitching on middle, and he nearly runs it right into a leg slip in place for him
length, just outside off, and he dabs this towards point and sets off. They make it, even though there's a hit at the non-striker's end. Watson gets off the mark with that
length ball, and he looks to flick this. Seemed to stop a bit, as he played it towards short midwicket
length, but strays on to the pads, and he has flicked this one past short fine leg, and finds the long leg boundary
fuller, angles into him, and he plays this towards square leg with soft hands
length, and he presses forward to punch this towards mid off. Travels quick, and there's no chance of getting any runs
slower ball, outside off, and he dabs this towards point and gets a quick single. Good response from Watson, as there was a shy at the stumps on the striker's end
short, and he goes back and picks this up and sends it one-bounce over the midwicket fence. Good, controlled shot, as he was careful enough to place it wide of the man at deep backward square
fuller ball, and goes off the outside edge and runs away past Bumrah at short third man and runs away for four. Vijay may have been shaping to flick this, but the output is something he won't mind
goes back to cut a length ball towards point. Wants a single, but Watson sends him back
length, and he gets down on his haunches and sweeps this in the air towards long leg. One bounce four, and cleverly played, as he covered the turn
plays a dab towards point with soft hands and runs through for a quick single
length, comes back into Watson, who goes back and defends this towards cover

ugly hoick across the line, and taken at mid on by Jayant Yadav! Oh dear, what have you done, Watson? It is a little short of a length, and he goes back and tries to get this over midwicket. The ball stops a bit and takes the leading edge, and Yadav runs across behind his right shoulder to take a smart overhead catch. Chennai lose three inside the Powerplay! How decisive could this be?
flighted, outside off, and he drives this down to long off
tossed up, and he drives this gracefully through the cover region and picks up a single to the sweeper cover region
length, and turns away past the outside edge, as Rayudu presses forward to defend
length, and he is able to get this past Rohit Sharma at slip and takes it towards short third man
length, turn again, and Vijay is beaten with the turn and bounce on offer
length, and he drives this inside out, and Pollard gets to it, but cannot prevent the ball from escaping his grasp and trickling into the extra cover fence
length, and he dabs this towards point and picks up a single
short, and he goes back and taps this towards midwicket and sets off immediately for the single
length, and he presses forward and defends this. Was bowled a bit slower, and he picked it late, and checked his shot, just playing it towards point
slower ball, outside off, and he runs this down towards third man by opening the face of his blade
length, and he presses forward and drives this. Skews it a bit as it runs towards point
length, a bit of width, and he cuts this fiercely. Gets it past a sprawling point fielder, but they have backward point in place too
length ball, and he taps this towards point. Has to turn down the single as it travels quickly
length, goes back, and it turns across him and he plays it defensively back straight
length, and it turns away from him. Rayudu uses his wrists to maneouvre this towards cover and picks up a quick single
length, and he goes back and tries to play it towards midwicket, but Krunal stops it on his follow-through
length, and he defends this towards point
length ball, goes back and plays this towards deep midwicket
length, outside off, and he cuts it towards point and picks up a single
length, and he allows it to turn into him, plays it with soft hands towards cover and runs through for a quick single
fuller ball, and he drives this down to long on with force, but cannot elude the fieldsman in the deep
uses his feet to get down the pitch and runs it down to long on
length, and he goes back and cuts it towards point
sharp turn, back into him, and beats the edge, as well the top of off stump. Close!
full and drifting down leg - possibly a slower cutter - leg-side wide
fuller at the pads, Rayudu flicks a single through square leg
slower ball on middle and leg from around the wicket, Vijay bunts a single through the midwicket region
bouncer on leg stump from around the wicket, 133.5ks, aimed at the head of Rayudu. He yanks his head out of the way. Sails through to the keeper- called a no-ball as Malinga's front foot has strayed
seam-up, full ball on middle, Rayudu jumps across off and tickles it away fine of deep fine leg for four
knocked away through square leg for one
slower offcutter on middle, Vijay reads it, closes his face and works this 115.2ks ball square on the leg side for one
shorter on middle, yet another offcutter, Rayudu camps back and nudges a single through midwicket
Rayudu dashes down the track, Bumrah shortens his length, jabbed away to the left of cover. They hare across for a single. Rohit can't throw the stumps down and put Vijay in danger
121.4ks slower ball outside off, looks like an offutter, Vijay does not read the variation. He goes for a loft and winds up skewing it in the air, but away from the reach of wide long-on
wide of the crease, short and slanting into the body of Vijay, carefully fended to the leg side off the back foot
short and sharply angling into the body of Vijay, he flicks it to the right of midwicket. Rayudu eyes up a single, some miscommunication, but Rayudu undoes his steps in time
short on off, Vijay arches his back and runs a single to the right of the keeper. Rayudu scrambles for a single
back of a length and outside off, Rayudu scythes it away straight to point

...and Chahar has Vijay stumped. Turn, turn turn. Big turn! Tossed-up legbreak, starts on leg stump and screams away outside off. Vijay closes his face and aims it clip it away to the leg side. He can't touch it. Ripping turn for Chahar, it leaves Vijay overbalanced. De Kock breaks the bails off. A run-a-ball 26 from Vijay - Badrinath-esque innings on a very tough track
back of a length and breaks away outside off, Dhoni hangs back and jabs to point for one
flatter, shorter and breaks away outside off, forced off the back foot to sweeper cover
looks like a topspinner, kicks up outside off past the iffy prod of Dhoni
straighter one on off, Dhoni deploys a long stride and pushes the ball to cover
shorter legbreak outside off, Dhoni goes on the back foot and punches a single to sweeper cover
skids on with the arm, full, Dhoni aims a sweep... and does not make contact, falling over

looped up and outside off, Dhoni dashes down the track, gets closer to the pitch and launches it with the break over the long-on fielder. He's been using his feet early in the innings v spin this season. First six of the night
dropped short and outside off, Dhoni knows Jayant will drag his length back, scythed away to sweeper on the off side
flatter on middle and leg, tapped to the leg side off the back foot
darted flat on off, stabbed away to midwicket. Dhoni wants the single, Rayudu denies it, Dhoni hares back and makes it
pushed through on middle, 99ks, Rayudu now dares to step down the track. Smoked over midwicket. Just like that two sixes in five balls. CSK are off and running at Chepauk
full on off, Dhoni punches a single off the front foot to mid-off
Rayudu shuffles across off and defensively bunts a length ball to short midwicket
full and outside off, Rayudu goes after it. He doesn't middle it but just about lifts it over mid-off for four
full-toss, shoved on middle, Rayudu shovels it away to wide long-on
back of a length on middle and leg, there comes Dhoni's favourite back-foot jab through midwicket
slower ball, full and wide outside off, Rayudu reaches out for the ball and carves it away to sweeper cover
skidding into the pads, nudged behind square on the leg side
drifts in towards off, grips and turns past the outside edge. It wasn't too far away from brushing off stump
Dhoni stretches out and pushes a full ball down to wide long-off
tossed up and bounces on middle, Rayudu top-edges a sweep square of Malinga at short fine leg
flatter and quicker on middle, Rayudu searches for a reverse-paddle and manages an under-edge onto it
shorter on middle and leg, Rayudu sits back and forces it through midwicket
short, slow, spins away, Rayudu swats it down to long-on
looped up and spins away outside off, driven with the break to the off-side sweeper
back of a length and breaks away outside off, Rayudu goes deep in the crease and punches to long-off
short and wide outside off, Dhoni misses out on a scoring opportunity, slapping straight to cover
short, turn and bounce, Dhoni rides the bounce and guides to point
fuller and outside off, Dhoni can just jab it back to Chahar. He ends with 4-0-14-2
Rayudu welcomes him back with a boundary. Rayudu jumps across off even before Bumrah delivers this short offcutter. Hauls a pull away over midwicket for four. Boom
mighty full and outside off, jammed down to long-off
full on middle again, Dhoni can't quite get underneath it. Pushed away to long-off
full-toss outside off, 140ks, reverse-paddled it away only as far as short third man
slower, short ball outside off, Dhoni reaches out for it and splices it in the air. Does not carry to Rohit diving forward from cover
fuller and outside off, Bumrah takes pace off again, Dhoni can't manufacture it for himself. Tugged away to wide long-on
middle-stump yorker from round the wicket, shovelled away to wide long-on
Rayudu jumps across off and aims a scoop. Very full on leg stump from Malinga, deflected away to de Kock diving away to his left

That's outta here! That's the Thala Chennai wants to see. Nice and full on off, in the slot, Dhoni clears his front leg and launches it hiiiiigh and far over midwicket. Bang. He has monstered it over the leg-side boundary
Bang! Bang! Dhoni smashes it over long-on now. Full on off from round the wicket again, Malinga misses his length. Dhoni tees off once again and Chepauk roars with him. Hoisted over long-on
full-toss on off, tapped back to Malinga, who dives to his right to stop the ball
full-toss on off, Dhoni swings and inside-edges it onto the pad, the ball dribbles away to cover

144.2ks full-toss on off or just outside off from Bumrah. Dhoni swings for the hills, his bat flies over his shoulder into the leg side. Spliced away in the air, Kishan runs back and catches it at point. Hold on, they're checking for a front-foot no-ball. No-ball it is. Bumrah's front foot has strayed. It's all happening in Chennai
banged in short on middle, head-high ball, Dhoni hooks it over square leg. Just one off the free-hit
Bumrah nails the yorker on leg stump, Dhoni can only jab it down to long-on for one
slower ball, back of a length and outside off, hard-to-hit length, hauled away to wide long-on
off-stump yorker, squirted away towards wide long-on. Dhoni hares back for the second
low full-toss on off, Dhoni carves it away towards deep point and ticks over the strike to Rayudu for the last ball
full-toss on middle, down the track and punched down to wide long-off
length, a hint of movement away and he punches this through covers. Superb timing on that!

length ball, straightens into him, and strikes him in front of the wickets as he shapes to flick. Given out! Will they review this? Yes he does? Hits him quite high, but remember it's been given out. No edge on it, and pitches in line, and just stays with umpire's call! What a breakthrough...getting rid of the captain and a man who could have neutralised the threat of Chennai's spinners better than most others!
length, outside off, and he defends
straighter, and he flicks this away towards short midwicket, and quickly turns down de Kock, who was keen on a quick single
fuller, outside off, and he looks to drive this, but can only get it towards mid off
short, and he cuts this, and it goes past first slip and short third man, bisecting the gap perfectly towards the third man fence. Chancy!
tossed up, on off stump, and he drives this towards extra cover
tossed up, and he drives this towards point
tossed up, and he drives again, but cannot beat the man at extra cover
down the leg side, and de Kock looks for a sweep. It beats Dhoni, turning behind him, and they run two, as Nigel Llong calls this a wide
fired in a bit quicker, and de Kock hangs back and plays it late towards third man, making sure he beats first slip
slows this up, good turn from outside off, as it beats the bat in an attempted sweep
length ball, and he plays this towards point
full, down leg side, and Yadav whips this away on the on side, but it lands just short of Harbhajan fielding at long leg
a little short, and he plays the cut, using the pace on the ball, but it goes to point
length, angles across him, and he defends this
length, angles across him, and he scoops this up and laps this down towards fine leg. Top shot!. Ensured that he kept it beyond the reach of deep backward square leg
short, and he looks to pull this towards midwicket. Gets no timing on it, as it runs down towards mid on
slower ball, outside off, and he cuts it but straight to point
length, and he pushes this towards square leg to pick up a single

length, and he moves away to make room for himself and go inside out, but he has scooped this straight to wide long off! The little bit of turn that takes it away from him, and he might have looked to go straighter than where it wound up. Faf du Plessis barely needed to move!
length, and he shuffles across and flicks this away towards deep backward square leg
length, and he presses forward and defends this
flatter ball, and he goes back and plays this defensively. Takes a little of the outside edge and runs away towards first slip
flighted, and he drives this towards cover
length, and he drives this back down towards the bowler, who sticks his hand out and stops this
strays in line, down the leg side, and he shuffles across and glances this away to fine leg
short, and he has played an uppish shot across the line, and Vijay at mid on cannot get to this! Very lucky boundary there for Yadav
short, and he whips this off his pads with a little shuffle across the stumps, getting it down to deep backward square leg
short, and he swings this away off the backfoot towards long leg. Roll of the wrists to keep the ball down
length, and he defends this
length ball, and he flicks this away but cannot beat short fine leg
length, and he whips this away off his hips, keeping it wide of square leg
length, and turns away from him as he looks to stretch and defends this. Beaten all ends up!
length, and he advances and tries to go over midwicket, and gets the outside edge. Almost taken by Watson at first slip, but eludes his grasp and in fact runs away for four to third man!
length ball, defended
tossed up, and he whips this away over midwicket. Got all of it, and a positive note to end a Powerplay, where Chennai Super Kings have been asking all the right questions!
length, and he defends this bowled on his off stump
fuller, and he whips this away towards deep midwicket
length, bowled quick, and he goes back and defends this towards midwicket
short, and he swings this around towards long leg. They want two, but Imran Tahir does well to attack the ball and keep it down to one
short, and he goes back and pushes this towards deep midwicket. Got it to the left of the fielder there, and they scurry back for the second
length, and beats him on the outside edge as he stretches to defend
length, angles across him, and he runs this down to third man
fuller, but on the pads, and he shuffles across the crease and flicks this towards deep midwicket
slower ball, and it took forever to reach Kishan, who was looking to swing this away towards fine leg. Half-appeal from Bravo, but it did catch the toe-end of the bat, directed at leg stump
length, angles across him, and he steers this to third man
length ball, angles into him, and he drives this down to long on
length, and he drives this back to Bravo from the crease
starts with a googly, and Yadav goes back and whips this away towards deep midwicket
turns into him, and he whips this away towards square leg
tossed up, and he cuts this towards point
short, wrong 'un, and he goes back and lofts this wide of long on
flighted, outside off, and he drives this towards long off
flighted, and he drives this towards long off. Airy, but safe as there was no fielder within reach of that
full ball, down leg side, and he flicks this away towards long leg. There's a deep backward square leg and fine leg, who will get around to it and keep it down to two
length, outside off, slower ball, and he drives this beautifully past Deepak Chahar at mid off. Chahar dives away to his left, but found the ball running away from him all the time
length, and he shuffles across and flicks this away towards deep backward square leg
length, angles across him and he drives wide of mid off and picks up a quick single. Yadav was a bit iffy to respond, but eventually gets through comfortably
full ball, wide of off stump, and he runs this down to third man
fuller, around off, and he smashes this down towards long on
slides on outside off, not much turn either way, slog-swept straighter than intended to long-on
wrong'un, Suryakumar does not pick it and falls over, heading down leg side
full-toss on middle, Suryakumar twirls his wrists and whips it away to the midwicket fence
too full and outside off, Suryakumar brings out a little helicopter and whips to the right of long-on for back-to-back boundaries
short googly on off, punched down to long-on
tossed up and spins away outside off, this googly is hit down to long-off
dropped shorter and wider, spins away further, Kishan cracks it off the back foot to sweeper cover
shorter and outside off, under-edged to first slip
Kishan falls over the flick takes this one the pad
slides on outside off, run away past second slip
on the pads from round the wicket, clipped off the back foot to deep square leg
flighted and outside off, slog-swept against the turn to long-on
full and spins back in, Kishan can't put it away with a flick
Kishan uses his feet, Jadeja goes shorter and gets it to spin in and hits the thigh pad again
really full on middle, stabbed back to Jadeja's right
on a length and spins away a wee bit, tip and run to cover
pushed through outside off and spins back in, whipped away into the leg side. Smart batting from Kishan and Suryakumar
on a length and spins away outside off, flatter, run away past the right of slip and left of short third man for four
starts on middle and spins down the leg side, Kishan lets it go, away from the reach of Dhoni. Harbhajan runs back, dives belatedly, and scoops the ball back near the fine leg boundary
skidder on middle, punched away to midwicket

tossed up and outside off, spins away, Suryakumar manipulates the field and deftly glides it away fine of Harbhajan at short third man. There's no way Harbhajan is going to cut this off. Fifty for Suryakumar
pushed through on middle and leg, whipped through midwicket
back of a length and on middle, forced back to Tahir
skidder from Tahir, takes out the off stump. Tahir doesn't quite run like he often does, fairly subdued celebration. Kishan aims to pull it away to the leg side, but Tahir's quick for him

Tahir appeals for caught and bowled. Umpire Llong calls for a review. The soft signal is out. Oh, Krunal is walking. Dipping full-toss on off, Krunal toe-ends it right back to Tahir. Krunal is off the field even before the TV umpire rules him out. Just like that, two in two for Tahir
Jadeja finds the outside edge but it eludes the reach of Watson. Okay, dropped it is.  Drifts in and turns away, poked away, Watson dives away to his left and goes with one hand but the ball pops out
slides on outside off, punched to the covers
full, drifts in and turns sharply past the outside edge
dropped short and spins away outside off, cut away past point, Bravo dives to his left from sweeper cover and cuts it off
tossed up on middle, driven down to long-on
full on the stumps, 100.6ks, jabbed back to Jadeja
slides on outside off, chopped hard to the left of sweeper cover
floated up on off, turns away a bit, driven down to long-off
flighted on off, driven back to Tahir
faster and flatter on leg stump, Hardik paddles it away fine of long leg for four
slower legbreak outside off, whisked back to Tahir
flatter on middle and leg, eased down to long-on
full on off, punched down to long-on
full-toss outside off, shovelled away with the wrists to the right of long-on. Faf runs across to his right and swats it away towards deep midwicket
short on middle, punched down to long-on
slower ball from Bravo, 99.9ks, full and outside off, Suryakumar slices a loft. Faf runs in from long-on, dives gingerly and can't get to the ball. It drops in front of him
overpitched and outside off, belted straight of Faf at long-on
yorker on off, squeezed to midwicket
dragged down outside off, smeared away to long-on
arm-ball, defended to short cover
shortish and outside off, cut to point where Faf makes a diving save
slides in on middle, worked to the leg side
jabbed to point, Pandya searches for a single but is sent back
on a length, drifts in and spins past the outside edge
slower bouncer, flapped down to long-on
on a length and outside off, Suryakumar shuffles across off and scoops it fine on the leg side over Dhoni's head for four to level the scores
slower short ball outside off, pulled away to deep square and Mumbai enter their fifth IPL final
